featured.text: Then in the Victorian era (19th century), weaving companies began to systematically record and formalize the system of setts for commercial purposes.
The future may be a vehicle-accident-free era.

definition.zh_def: 時代；一段特定的歷史期間
definition.en_def: A period of time marked by distinctive character, events, or circumstances.
definition.example: The Victorian era was known for its strict social norms.
